category: news
title: "AI-designed protein awakens silenced genes, one by one"
excerpt: "By combining CRISPR technology with a protein designed with artificial intelligence, it is possible to awaken individual dormant genes by disabling the chemical \"off switches\" that silence them. Researchers from the University of Washington School of Medicine in Seattle describe this finding in the journal Cell Reports."
